Topic.Title: Command cursor disappears after picking from 'Which do you mean?' feature.

Posts.EditableText:
I'm doing my best to avoid this happening, but a couple of times during testing I get an object name clash if I try to interact with two things with the same name. This results in the automated **Which box do you mean - box 1 or box 2**

After I pick one by clicking on it, I lose my command cursor and can't get it back.

Probably just my effed up code again, but anyone else ever get this?

Hopefully I can work through and avoid any name clashes, but there's always a chance I'll miss one so it would be nice to know if this is a bug or not.
